name: Spookality avatar "Vanessa"
description:
Hi!

This is my entry for the Spookality 2021 Jam by VRchat. It's an avatar made both for PC and Quest and therefore I kept it simple but charming. :)

The model, model's rig and textures are entirely made from scratch by me for the Jam.

The model has 2 different rigs and weights for PC and Quest to make it look smooth on both platforms, I also made sure the shader's look carries over between them in spirit of inclusion.

I hope you enjoy!
